operation.title: Operation
operation.description: Explicit operation to perform: "create", "read", "update", "delete", or "find". If not specified, operation will be inferred from context: has fieldDataJson + recordId = update, has fieldDataJson only = create, has recordId only = read, has searchTerm/filtersJson = find, has recordId only (no data/search) = delete.

fieldDataJson.title: Field Data JSON
fieldDataJson.description: JSON string containing Task field data. For create: {"Subject":"Follow up with client","Status":"Not Started","Priority":"Normal","ActivityDate":"2024-12-31"}. For update: {"Status":"Completed","Priority":"High"}. For bulk operations: [{"Subject":"Task 1"},{"Subject":"Task 2"}]. Required for create/update operations. The agent should construct this JSON from natural language user input.

recordId.title: Record ID
recordId.description: The Salesforce record ID (15 or 18 character) of the Task. Required for read/update/delete operations. Format: 18-character ID like "00Txx000003DGbYAAW". For update, can be omitted if Subject is provided in fieldDataJson for automatic resolution. The agent should resolve this from task subject when possible rather than asking the user for an ID.

searchTerm.title: Search Term
searchTerm.description: Text to search for in Task fields (Subject, Description, etc.). Used for find operations. Example: "Follow up" or "meeting". IMPORTANT: If the user wants to find a task but hasn't provided a search term, ask them for the task subject, related account/contact, or other identifying information BEFORE calling this action. Do not call find operation without a searchTerm or filtersJson.

filtersJson.title: Filters JSON
filtersJson.description: JSON string of exact-match filters for find operations. Can be single object {"fieldApiName":"Status","value":"Completed"} or array [{"fieldApiName":"Status","value":"Completed"}]. IMPORTANT: If the user wants to find a task but hasn't provided specific filters, ask them for details like related account/contact, status, or due date BEFORE calling this action. Do not call find operation without a searchTerm or filtersJson.

searchLimit.title: Search Limit
searchLimit.description: Maximum number of records to return for find operations (default: 5, max: 20).

accountName.title: Account Name
accountName.description: Account name to resolve to WhatId for the Task. Links task to Account via WhatId. If provided, the system will search for an Account with this name and link the Task to it.

contactNameOrEmail.title: Contact Name or Email
contactNameOrEmail.description: Contact name or email to resolve to WhoId for the Task. Links task to Contact via WhoId. If provided, the system will search for a Contact and link the Task to them.

confirm.title: Confirm
confirm.description: For create/update: Set to false to preview only without committing. Default (true): Commits immediately. For delete: Set to true to actually delete. Default (false): Returns confirmation message first. The agent should first call delete with confirm=false, ask the user, then call again with confirm=true if confirmed.
